thread.title: GIS Surveyors Inc. Partners With Esri to Provide Latest in GIS Software
thread.title_full: GIS Surveyors Inc. Partners With Esri to Provide Latest in GIS Software

author: admin
title: GIS Surveyors Inc. Partners With Esri to Provide Latest in GIS Software
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: GIS Surveyors Inc. 
SAN DIEGO, Sept. 4, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- GIS Surveyors Inc. is proud to announce its new status as an Esri Business Partner, joining a worldwide network of companies utilizing cutting-edge geographic spatial solutions and services based on Esri technology. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150904/263806LOGO 
Esri is a global leader in geographic Information system software (GIS), web GIS and geodatabase management applications. A partnership with Esri enables organizations to tap into Esri's technology to develop solutions to geospatial problems around the globe. As a Business Partner, GIS Surveyors Inc. will utilize Esri's world-class software platform to develop and expand its GIS services. 
"GIS Surveyors Inc. is thrilled to be partnering with Esri, and to integrate our solutions and services with its high-caliber software," says Matthew Van Eck, Vice President of GIS Surveyors Inc. "This partnership will allow us to provide our clients with progressive solutions based on the latest software, continuing to deliver quality services supported by Esri's superior technology." 
As a partner with Esri, GIS Surveyors Inc. is certified as a world-class GIS service provider, recognized for its advanced technical expertise and in-depth knowledge of geospatial technology. Together, Esri and GIS Surveyors, Inc. will collaborate to support customers and end users through successful GIS implementations and repeatable solutions. 
For more information regarding GIS Surveyors Inc. services, visit www.gissurveyors.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/gis-surveyors-inc-partners-with-esri-to-provide-latest-in-gis-software-300138217.html 
SOURCE GIS Surveyors Inc.
